org.forgerock.openidm.crypto

Interface CryptoService


  • public interface CryptoService
    Provides encryption and decryption services to OpenIDM components.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Decrypts a JSON value and all of its children if necessary.
      org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue decryptIfNecessary(String value)
      Decrypts a String if in a format supported by this service and is decryption is necessary.

      Encrypts a JSON value.

      • getDecryptionTransformers

        List<org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonTransformer> getDecryptionTransformers()
        Returns a list of decryption transformers that can decrypt JSON values.
        Returns:
        a list of transformers that can decrypt JSON values.

      • encrypt

        org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue encrypt(org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue value,
                                          String cipher,
                                          String alias)
                                            throws org.forgerock.json.crypto.JsonCryptoException,
                                                   org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonException
        Encrypts a JSON value.
        Parameters:
        value - the JSON value to be encrypted.
        cipher - the cipher with which to encrypt the value.
        alias - the key alias in the key store with which to encrypt the value.
        Returns:
        a copy of the value, encrypted with the specified cipher and key.
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.crypto.JsonCryptoException - if and invalid cipher and/or alias is provided.
        org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonException - if an exception occurred encrypting the value.

      • decrypt

        org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue decrypt(org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue value)
        Decrypts a JSON value and all of its children.
        Parameters:
        value - the JSON value to be decrypted.
        Returns:
        a deep copy of the value, with all values decrypted.
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonException - if an exception occurred decrypting the value.

      • decrypt

        org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue decrypt(String value)
        Decrypts a String if in a format supported by this service.
        Parameters:
        value - the Stringified value to be decrypted.
        Returns:
        The decrypted structure value, with all values decrypted.
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonException - if an exception occurred decrypting the value.

      • decryptIfNecessary

        org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue decryptIfNecessary(org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue value)
        Decrypts a JSON value and all of its children if necessary. If not, returns the original object.

        Note that if the argument is null, this return a JsonValue wrapping null.

        Parameters:
        value - the JSON value to be decrypted.
        Returns:
        The structure value, decrypted if necessary.
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonException - if an exception occurred decrypting the value.

      • decryptIfNecessary

        org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue decryptIfNecessary(String value)
        Decrypts a String if in a format supported by this service and is decryption is necessary. If decryption is unnecessary, it returns the structure value.

        Note that if the argument is null, this will return a JsonValue wrapping null.

        Parameters:
        value - the Stringified value to be decrypted.
        Returns:
        The structure value, decrypted if necessary.
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonException - if an exception occurred decrypting the value.

      • isEncrypted

        boolean isEncrypted(org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue value)
        Detects if a JSON value is encrypted in a format supported by this service.
        Parameters:
        value - the JSON value to check.
        Returns:
        true if encrypted, false otherwise.

      • isEncrypted

        boolean isEncrypted(String value)
        Detects if a String is encrypted in a format supported by this service.
        Parameters:
        value - the JSON value to check.
        Returns:
        true if encrypted, false otherwise.
